snippet.title: Behemoth - The Game Awards 2022 Cinematic Trailer Debut
snippet.description:
Revealed at The Game Awards, studio and publisher Skydance Interactive dropped its first full-length trailer for Behemoth, a brand-new VR Action RPG targeting a late 2023 release. The cinematic trailer showcases Behemoth's brutal yet tactical VR combat and breathtaking traversal gameplay as players conquer monolithic beings in a grim, unforgiving world. This story driven, single-player VR game will launch on PlayStation VR2, Meta Quest 2, and PC VR. 

In Behemoth, players will explore the plague-ravished wasteland of a once glorious empire, where its inhabitants are driven mad and cities have fallen to ruin. In glorious VR fashion, players’ bodies and minds will be tested as they combat towering colossal giants called Behemoths. Raw strength won’t be enough, however, as they must use various tools in their arsenal to defeat these gigantic creatures and the other nightmarish enemies that scour this brutal world in their quest for a possible cure

The latest Behemoth updates  can be found:

behmothvr.com
https://www.facebook.com/BehemothVR
https://www.instagram.com/behemothvr/
https://twitter.com/BehemothVR
